price: Àti pé kí èmi máa ké al-Ƙur’ān. Nítorí náà, ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá mọ̀nà, ó mọ̀nà fún ẹ̀mí ara rẹ̀. Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá sì ṣìnà, sọ pé: “Dájúdájú èmi wà nínú àwọn olùkìlọ̀.”
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَتۡلُوَاْ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَۖ فَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهۡتَدِي لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنذِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-an atluwā al-qur'āna famani ih'tadā fa-innamā yahtadī linafsihi waman ḍalla faqul innamā anā mina al-mundhirīna
